sentences.english: I can make them all comfortable if you will only show confidence in me.
sentences.chinese: 只要你信任我，我就能让他们都过得舒舒服服的。

sentences.english: He had nestled down in the sleeping-bag when I came back.
sentences.chinese: 我回来的时候，他已经舒舒服服地睡在了睡袋里面。

sentences.english: He made himself wholly comfortable and toasted his feet.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己弄得舒舒服服的，烤着他的两只脚。

sentences.english: I can reach him with the gaff and eat him here in comfort.
sentences.chinese: 我可以用鱼钩把它钓过来，在这儿舒舒服服地吃。

sentences.english: He had saved enough money so that he could live in comfort.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能正座在甲板上舒舒服服地晒太阳。

sentences.english: They had enough money to live in comfort in their old age.
sentences.chinese: 他们有足够的钱舒舒服服地安度晚年。

sentences.english: I am pining for a corner in which to nestle down snugly, away from the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我渴望舒舒服服地躺在一个角落，远离喧扰。

sentences.english: People usually wear short pants and sandals, and cozily lounge on cane chairs.
sentences.chinese: 人们通常穿着短裤拖鞋，舒舒服服地坐在藤椅上。

sentences.english: When you lay on the beach comfortably, your phone rings.
sentences.chinese: 当你舒舒服服地躺在沙滩上时，手机响了。

sentences.english: He was leaning back in a comfortable armchair and savouring the brandy.
sentences.chinese: 他舒舒服服地靠在一张扶手椅上，细品着白兰地。

sentences.english: I lay comfortably in his arms and I begin to feel sleepy as usual.
sentences.chinese: 我舒舒服服地躺在他臂弯里，像往常一样开始犯困。

sentences.english: On the cushion's velvet lining that the lamp-light gloated o'er.
sentences.chinese: 舒舒服服地靠在那被灯光凝视的天鹅绒衬垫。

sentences.english: They wish to be at ease to kill, and to die comfortably.
sentences.chinese: 大家都愿意自在地杀敌或舒舒服服地死去。

sentences.english: She can be herself and be comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 她舒舒服服地做她自己就可以了。

sentences.english: I want my parents to be comfortable in their twilight years.
sentences.chinese: 我想让我的父母亲舒舒服服地度过暮年时光。

sentences.english: This is how you turn the sheet under so that it's comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 他就这样把被单折进去，弄得舒舒服服的。
